detail_desc: Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with ribbing at the top, a wide V-neck front and back, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a chest pocket. Yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Slightly longer at the back.
Cargo jacket in washed cotton twill with a detachable hood in sweatshirt fabric and a collar. Press-studs down the front, flap chest pockets, patch front pockets and ribbed cuffs. Lined.
Short, sleeveless lace dress with a contrasting colour lining. Opening and button at the back of the neck, an elasticated seam at the waist and a raw-edge hem.
Metal ball chain necklace with a plastic pendant in the shape of an angel. Length 45 cm.

Top in a patterned fine knit with a soft, brushed finish. Drawstring hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Pyjamas in soft pima cotton. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with and elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.

Short dress in velour with an opening with a decorative flounce at the back and a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves, a seam at the waist and a bell-shaped skirt with a short flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Short dress in ribbed jersey with a small frilled collar and long, sleeves with a flounce at the cuffs. Seam with a detachable tie belt at the waist and a gently bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.

Playsuit in plumeti chiffon containing glittery threads with a small frilled collar and opening at the back with a covered button at the back of the neck. Long, wide sleeves with a flounce at the cuffs, and an elasticated seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt. Partly lined in jersey.

Calf-length dress in spotted mesh with embroidery. V-neck, 3/4-length sleeves with flounced cuffs, an elasticated, gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Raw edges at the cuffs and hem. Jersey lining.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details. High waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs with raw-edge hems. Shaping – denim with a stretch function that holds in and shapes the waist, thighs and bum while keeping the jeans in shape.

Short, off-the-shoulder dress in sturdy jersey with long sleeves and elastication and two flounces in woven fabric at the top. Gathers in the sides for best fit. Unlined.

Leather boots with an ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front with speed hooks at the top, a loop at the back and a decorative welt seam around the soles. Fabric linings, leather insoles and soles made from thermoplastic rubber (TPR). Heel 3 cm.
3/4-length running tights in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Key pocket with a concealed zip, and reflective details.
Knitted jumper for a dog with pompoms on the back, a ribbed collar and ribbing around the front legs and back. Length at the top approx. 30 cm, circumference of collar 34 cm.

Short dress in a patterned viscose weave with a small stand-up collar, an opening and button at the back of the neck and a frill-trimmed yoke front and back. Long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, a concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Short dress in a crêpe weave with a square neckline trimmed in broderie anglaise, lacing at the top and long sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Seam at the waist with a gently flared skirt and a concealed zip in the side. Unlined.
